text: Guðmundur Þór Kárason (born 14 June 1974) is an Icelandic puppeteer and puppet designer, best known for his work on LazyTown, as well as the voice of Ziggy. He was born in Reykjavík, Iceland. Starting in 2004, Guðmundur was one of the founders of LTS Garðbær Studios (also known as LazyTown Entertainment), puppet performer and voice of Ziggy in LazyTown. In 2010, he was a photographer for the Eurovision Song Contest 2010. In 2011 he was the director and producer for the postcards and made the graphics for the Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2011 in the Armenian capital Yerevan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Artists Category:Puppeteers Category:People from Reykjavík
